name: Terroir
author: Peter Santerre aka ShockValue
description: A collection of high-quality, focused Eurorack modules.

modules.name: Lure
modules.description:
A bias-centered, force-field-driven Brownian walk. 
Output is shaped by pull gravity, softened edge repulsion, and CV-modulatable parameters including Speed, Bias, and Pull.
The result is a smooth, organic voltage source that explores a defined range with tunable drift behavior.
